org.phoenixbioinformatics.http

Interface IRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRequest, DeleteRequest, GetRequest, OptionsRequest, PostRequest, PutRequest

    public interface IRequest
    An API interface for proxy request implementation objects that represent a factory for HttpUriRequest objects to proxy to a target server
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpUriRequest getUriRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest servletRequest)
      Get the HTTP URI request object based on details in the servlet request.

    • Method Detail

      • getUriRequest

        org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpUriRequest getUriRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest servletRequest)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Get the HTTP URI request object based on details in the servlet request.
        Parameters:
        servletRequest - the HTTP servlet request containing the request details
        Returns:
        an HTTP URI request suitable for proxying
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when there is a problem streaming an entity or the entity character set is not a supported character set
